Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: To borrow from Yoda-speak: Much to desire we still have.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: A cosmic letdown to watch this new film and realize that Lucas still doesn't know how to write dialogue or direct flesh- and-blood actors and, even more significantly, has largely forgotten how to evoke wonder and have a little fun.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Instead of zesty and daring, Attack of the Clones is often labored and stif

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: This didn't feel like Star Wars. It felt like a movie ripping off Star Wars. Something wasn't right.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Christensen succeeds because he reveals the flashes of evil within Anakin's character: a word, a gesture, a youthful burst of impatience.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: This is a fantasy with no poetry in it, which explains why barely a frame of it stuck with me after I left the theater.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Lucas has recaptured and accentuated the elements that made the original films such a joy to experience.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Well, it's not as bad as the last one.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Just entertaining enough to warrant a bit more than a passing grade, the film is better than Menace, but not by a great deal and still has too many glaring problems to make it as good or just plain enjoyable as it could and should have been.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Not quite as good as you'd hope, but Clones marches in the right direction.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Bristles with excitement in every frame making this installment a high-energy adventure.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: The emphasis on computer-generated effects ultimately robs the movie of much of its energy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Clones is more star chores than Star Wars.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: No screen fantasy-adventure in recent memory has the showmanship of Clones' last 45 minutes.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Critic Review: Attack of the Clones is a triumph of technology over humanity, and if it falls short of a completely fulfilling experience, it also achieves the kind of primal emotion movies were invented for: wonder.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: The saga regains its grandeur with a complicated but easy-to-follow story. The characters are as satisfying as the effects.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Too close to Phantom Menace for comfort.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Star Wars is back in a major way.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: If you're not a long-standing admirer there's little reason to join the queues on opening night.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: The words 'star wars' set off an ingrained Pavlovian reaction to embrace unconditionally. You might as well ask me to critique my mother.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Consistently thrilling and massively enjoyable, Clones redeems Lucas' reputation after Menace.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: The persistent shadow of Darth Vader is the most interesting aspect in a movie that fails to live up to its potential.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: It's a lot of fun and there's a lot of great action sequences.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: The picture looks absolutely gorgeous...but quite simply, it's difficult to decide what's flatter--Lucas' helming or his writing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Dozens of moments catch you up and take your breath away.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: A decidedly mixed bag.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: This thing will have your mind glazed over faster than a glob of dough in a Krispy Kreme plant.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Much-anticipated and ultimately lackluster movie.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: Do we really have to wait another three years?

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE II - ATTACK OF THE CLONES
Critic Review: While the film is clearly a step up from Menace, it still has its weak points.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Critic Review: Sith comes back with full force.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The final, bridging movie between George Lucas's two epic Star Wars trilogies ends not with a bang but with plenty of artistic whimpering

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge of the Sith is, so Lucas assures us, a 'tragedy'. It might have been wise to have stationed an announcer at every movie house to announce this fact over the PA system since it eluded the audience I saw it with last weekend.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge of the Sith is far from a great film but it easily trumps its two predecessors.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The pity is that Lucas and his team couldn't have just manufactured the toys and the "Making Of" coffee table books and given the films a miss.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Strong, unrelenting, moving and bracingly exciting, Revenge Of The Sith is a fitting end to a truly great series.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: For all the hype, I fear this is a film that only the most uncritical Star Wars fans will truly enjoy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: I must say that I did get quite emotional in this.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: I think it is visually exciting. I think there are wonderful things in it but I just missed that innocence of the early films.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Thankfully, Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge Of The Sith has a good deal to offer besides its cachet as the farewell to a pop culture.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Lucas slips up on a few fronts en route, but doesn't disappoint when it counts.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Of course, being best Star Wars film since Empire Strikes Back isn't saying much, when you consider what came between...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Critic Review: The best-looking Star Wars episode of all, if not the most exciting, most imaginative or most affecting.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: .. even though Revenge is a better experience than Phantom Menace or Attack of the Clones, it doesn't add

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: We are all preprogrammed in one way or another to want Episode III -- Revenge of the Sith to climax in the way it does. All George had to do was not screw that up. He didn't.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Heretical though it sounds, [Sith] may come closest of all the films to achieving the balance between gee-whiz sci-fi spectacle and mythic resonance to which Lucas aspired.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: For many, the Sith finale will redeem all three prequels. Others will wonder why Lucas wasted so many dollars, years and pixels on a story that could have been told in one film, or better yet, not at all.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Lucas still can't write. His dialogue crashes and burns like an X-wing zapped out of the sky by a star destroyer.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Star Wars, for better or worse, was the genuine article. How then can there not be a relevance, and a resonance, in saying goodbye?

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: To say that Revenge of the Sith is a vast improvement is not extravagant praise -- but neither is it any kind of putdown.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: All those who wondered whether writer-director George Lucas was going to end his sci-fi career in a downward tailspin can rest easy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: My favorite of the three most recent Star Wars movies, Revenge of the Sith mixes all of the best elements from its predecessors.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Sith takes a while to sink in, but once you get used to its rhythm, it provides the most satisfying Star Wars adventure of the last 20 years.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: While Sith is mostly enjoyable, the best part about it is that we are finally done with the journey.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Star Wars, people, is back.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge of the Sith is the most energetic of the prequels, the only one at all worth watching. But that doesn't mean it is without the weaknesses that scuttled its pair of predecessors.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: It's the darkest of the six-film opus, but it just may be the best of the lot.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Though it starts slowly, it lumbers toward greatness in the last third and restores him briefly to the top of his class.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: It took 22 years, but the Jedi has finally returned.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Sure to please diehard fans and fringe folk alike.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The Jedi faithful deserve far better than this.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: As he brings his beginning to an end, George Lucas finally produces a second-generation Star Wars adventure worthy of the originals.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: I think it's the best one since The Empire Strikes Back.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Crippled as he is by the decisions of the first two films, Lucas manages to invest the final chapter of his space opera with the grand operatic spirit of the original trilogy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: ...the dialogue is astonishingly feeble, the acting unforgivably woode

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The scariest, most exciting, most visually prodigious of the sextet, with action sequences that explode off the screen, characters who finally awaken your sentiments.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: George Lucas has achieved what few artists do; he has created and populated a world of his own.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: ... the visually stunning Sith is also the fastest-paced and most accessible.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: All those Star Wars geeks, who've been waiting for weeks outside movie theaters with their Yoda sleeping bags and their homemade lightsabers, finally have a film that's worthy of their perseverance.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Even with its pulpy excesses showing, Revenge of the Sith has a grandiose melancholy that will especially haunt those who have grown up revering the Skywalker chronicles. The rest of the audience may well be on its own.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Lucas' pioneering work in computer-generated special effects has often gotten the better of him, but this time the action and the visual effects are splendid.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: So much here is guaranteed to cause either offense or pain.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith ... is without doubt the best of the three most recent films. That's not exactly high praise...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: This is by far the best film in the more recent trilogy, and also the best of the four episodes Mr. Lucas has directed. That's right: it's better than Star Wars.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge Of The Sith is brilliant. It's as if it took Lucas two goes to get comfortable in the director's chair and can now actually apply a bit of style to the proceedings.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Anakin's defection from Jediism to Sithdom should provide the film's backbone, but neither the script nor Christensen delivers the needed nuance.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Oh my... it's neither spongeworthy nor Vader-riffic.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Once the cogs are set in motion for the creation of Vader, & the Clone Wars start getting bloody, Sith commences to cook in a way that no movie has since Empire.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Color me disappointed -- and I say this as a huge Star Wars fan. Its murky plotting and its long, video game battles left me cold and bored.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: A flawed masterpiece.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Let the projectionist raise the audio above a whisper, and your enjoyment of the free-flowing spectacle will be diluted by some of the worst acting and writing known to mainstream film -- and that's by George Lucas' meager standards.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Drink the Kool-Aid. Wear blinders. Cover your ears. Because that's the only way you can totally enjoy Revenge of the Sith.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The more casual fan may be left feeling like Revenge of the Sith scores a technical knockout rather than the real thing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: As it morphs to connect with Episode IV, Lucas manages to add new resonance to the overall saga.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge of the Sith is not the "masterpiece" some make it out to be. It is, simply, a far more worthy installment than we've recently been fed.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Thank the movie gods this one is better than the two previous Star Wars films.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: An exhilarating, inexorably dark, somewhat distressing rollercoaster ride of fun ... the film Star Wars fans have been waiting for.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: May be the fourth best film in the series. It's still a tossup with Ewok Adventure, but I haven't seen that in a while so it may not hold up as well.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: It may well be the best of all six Star Wars movies.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: At last ... Lucas brings forth the long-awaited, well-earned kick-*** conclusion to the latest Star Wars trilogy. Fans will cheer!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge of the Sith was the film that should have salvaged the prequels. It doesn't.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: So sound in its construction and...[its] space-operatic catharsis that even the nitpickiest fanboy will likely adopt a humbly mumbled 'All is forgiven' as a daily mantra

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Lucas manages to turn the audience's familiarity to his advantage: like a jigsaw puzzle whose final form has always been known, the fun is in discovering how the last pieces fit.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Perhaps the Dark Side is stronger after all; it certainly makes the conclusion of this journey a memorable one.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Revenge Of The Sith strings a complex plot onto a framework of practically non-stop action.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Mercifully, Revenge Of The Sith is (deep sigh) light-years ahead of the turgid Menace and the undercooked Clones.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: with a sigh of relief we come to the end of a trilogy that fell criminally short of all that is could have, and by all rights, should have been

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Goodbye, Star Wars, and thanks for everything. It's been a wonderful ride.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The transformation, when it comes, is sensational, and all the more agonising because it is never absolute

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Will be remembered as one of the greatest movies ever made. 'Classic' isn't kind enough a word for this gem. The best film to be unleashed onto the public in 25 years!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: A rousing and tragic sendoff to a beloved franchise, and the best installment in the Star Wars series since 1980's The Empire Strikes Back.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Lucas pays off the most elaborate setup in film history.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: This film finally creates a saga out of Star Wars, and that saga deserves its recognition as one of the finest ever to be delivered to cinema screens.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Energetic and character-driven, the new film, which is both mythic and contempo in its politics, ends with a bang, obliterating the bad taste left by Episodes I & II.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: A good film, but just not the classic it could have been.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: If, as director Lucas has said, this is the final film in the saga, he has done himself justice by going out with a winner.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The magic died a long time ago, see, Episode III is just the death twitch.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: I imagine that Revenge of the Sith is very much the film Lucas's fans want to see, but are some of them ready for an anti-Bush diatribe?

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Even though Ian McDiarmid is a delicious bad guy, John Williams' music is what sets this apart from other mundane films that survive on special effects.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Enthralling and triumphant, Lucas saved the best for last, completing a significant cultural phenomenon that now encompasses six films.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Finally, Lucas recaptures some of the magic!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: With strong performances by Ian McDiarmid, Ewan McGregor, and Yoda, it delivers much of the action and darkness that fans have been looking for. The final connection with the Classic Trilogy ultimately makes it a satisfying conclusion to the Saga.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: The final episode of George Lucas' cinematic epic Star Wars ends the six-movie series on such a high note that one feels like yelling out, 'Rewind!'

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Whatever one thought of the previous two installments, this dynamic picture irons out most of the problems, and emerges as the best in the overall series since The Empire Strikes Back.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: An unexpectedly sweet pleasure... a dark and gripping slice of space opera, it successfully avoids the pitfalls of its predecessors.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: Star Wars fans have finally been rewarded for their patience. George has made another masterpiece.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
Critic Review: We already know how this film turns out and no one at Lucasfilm has the wit to make the journey interesting.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A key moment... has all the poignancy of discovering an old toy in the attic-or in this case, in the middle of a desert-and finding not only that it still works, but it has a role in saving the universe.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a grand adventure that illustrates how some things might stay the same, but other things can always, always change for the better.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The same vague, mystical wonder - accompanied by the twittering flutes of John Williams - fills the screen that ran imaginations wild in the '70s.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There's everything you want in a Star Wars film here and fans of the original will not be disappointed.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams has succeeded where George Lucas failed: He has remembered what made Star Wars good in the first place.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Incorporating old and new concepts and characters together blends wonderfully. The style feels like George Lucas' golden touch.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's both nostalgic and fresh, a tender homage to, especially, the initial Star Wars ("Episode IV: A New Hope"), as well as a bridge to help those of us stuck in the splendor of Hoth edge into the future.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: What crystallizes the film, especially for veterans of the Star Wars franchise is the sense of history and consequence from the last film in the storyline.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A truly wonderful movie-one worthy of its years-long hype and the Star Wars name itself.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Star Wars film we needed (a palate cleanser). Funny, full of action and lots of feels, this new entry achieves great balance between nostalgia and novelty.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The film's political resonances are as mutable - and as muddled - as those of its predecessors.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is so crammed full of fun stuff it's like an economy-sized jar of Prego.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: If you were worried that this movie was going to be like the prequels, or Star Wars: Into Darkness, do not worry. It captures the heart, it captures the soul, it captures everything that you liked about Star Wars growing up.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This movie carries so much magic.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars: The Force Awakens may not have provided me with an artistic experience, but it did maintain my interest in the rest of the trilogy, and there is something to be said for that.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams has done a lot more than rebirth this series, he has renewed it with hope for the future

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The storytelling is top notch. It's a carefully-crafted dance of nuance that balances a bit of everything

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It succeeds by managing to be spectacular, thrilling and, as Star Wars past meets Star Wars present and future, unexpectedly moving, too.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The final product is that The Force Awakens is emotionally satisfying, but you kind of have to play dumb to get along with it. It's a good movie-a really good one, on the surface level-but it falls just short of great.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams seems far more intent on delivering on the promise of the originals as rousing space Westerns where good and evil stood opposite one another and dared the other side to blink.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Even if TFA is mostly fan service, I'll take it.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The new cast is brilliant. I still want to see where Episode VIII goes. But I'm in no rush to see it again as a standalone film.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: ... the end result is immensely satisfying, and should be so both for fans like myself and newcomers.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Thank the Maker the Galaxy still has life in it.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: In short, The Force Awakens does what it needs to do. The familial saga of parents and children, power sought and power won, still sing to us on a genetic level.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams makes the Star Wars movie every fan wants to see, and it succeeds effortlessly at doing more than merely cashing in on nostalgia.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I've been sold on the rich possibilities of these new movies. I'm letting the Force in this time.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: JJ Abrams's sequel has, thank the Lord, delivered, with John Boyega and Daisy Ridley proving up to the challenge, too.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens takes its legions of rabid fanboys very seriously, throwing them meaty bone after bone.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars: The Force Awakens gives new life to a franchise of hope, resilience, courage and family that's been missing from theatres for far too long.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a big Star Wars universe out there and Abrams has just made it bigger again with this mix of fan boy homage and a fresh and quirky vision of his own.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is fun. I'm not sure that it's great. ... But on the heels of the prequels, well, maybe fun is all we really need.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As the most anticipated film release that I can remember in some time, "The Force Awakens" has some big shoes to fill. And fill them it does.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars: The Force Awakens honors the series and takes it in exciting new directions. Both The Millennium Falcon and millennials, it would seem, are in good hands.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: What we've got here is a film that managed, on the first try, to turn the engine over in a car that has been collecting dust for 32 years. Now, they didn't drive it anywhere, so we can't tell if it was worth the effort.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: What is the Force, and Jedi-ism? In Star Wars, it refers to the ability of a high-level martial-artist-knight to use supernormal abilities. Science has proven 6 of them.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I'm happy to tell you that, despite some minor fumbles, this is definitely the Star Wars film we've been looking for.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams is trying to recreate that experience for a whole new generation eager to be captured by the charge and action and exotic Amazing Stories covers come to life in a fairy tale space fantasy that takes place long ago and a galaxy far, far away...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: 'The Force Awakens' does what the original films did well - and is also its own, thrilling thing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's fan fiction writ large, making it clearer than ever that George Lucas is "Star Wars." With his voice gone, all that's left are tinny reverberations of movie history.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A trio of writers led by Lawrence Kasdan put the fun and fast-paced serial adventure back into Luke Skywalker's galaxy, and, just as importantly they give us new characters that we care about.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The return to that galaxy far, far away that audiences have longed for.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This is more than just a nostalgia trip: Star Wars is back and it feels beautiful.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J Abrams has done the impossible; he has created - and recreated - a Star Wars movie and made it look and feel like a Star Wars movie should. Funny, sad, exciting and enlivening, it is a definite and an absolute must-see.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Please, no more sermons about midichlorians and the Force - let's get those light sabers crackin'! And crack they do,

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Humour and heart are prominent amid the breathtaking action.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: [Abrams'] plot mirrors that of A New Hope, but deliberately so: it will charm old fans, win many new ones, and make everyone an awful lot of money.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's loud and full of vim -- but a little hollow and heartless.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is, truly, a stunning exercise in large-scale filmmaking; a beautifully-assembled picture in which Abrams combines a magnificent cast with a marvelous flair for big-screen, sci-fi storytelling.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Great in the awe-inspiring, tear-provoking way that only films built on generations of dreams can be great... It taps not into what the original films were, but what they meant to audiences, how they made us feel.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The film has an excellent rhythm that gives you but a few minutes to recover from all the action before plunging you right into another battle.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The film is action packed but driven by the story which is about the people, and specifically family issues which we can all relate to.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's thrilling, fantastical and feels like Star Wars.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is more of a bridge than a completely new era, but it successfully lets audience live again in a galaxy far, far away.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: If what's contained is ultimately the planting of seeds that will continue growing two, four, or forty years down the line, I suspect this franchise is in its best-ever state.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars: The Force Awakens dazzles audiences with a surface of nostalgic fun made shiny new-but beneath that mask, if you care to notice it, lurks an abyss of futility.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The spectacular 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' provides a new hope for future generations of moviegoers.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A spectacular film that will keep the franchise going for many years to come.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams understands that a great Star Wars movie is not only about the whiz-bang external stuff, but also about the soul in its classic riff on the eternal struggle between the sides of light and dark (good vs evil).

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Technically a reboot from the original 1977 film, J. J. Abrams breathes live back into the franchise, pleasing old fans and creating legions of new ones. I felt like I was 12 years-old again!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It relaunched the franchise in a real majestic way, mixing new characters with the familiar faces of the original trilogy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It has all the spirit of the original saga while also introducing new characters for a new generation. It will make you feel like a kid again.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This latest installment of fandom's favorite mongrel pet is a poorly paced MacGuffin-chase plot, ginned up with groan-inducing spoonful doses of pro-war imagery and its attendant rudimentary vocabulary.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Bravo! Ford ignites the movie! He's the star and jumps right back into the iconic role. Disney brought a princess but it was a bait and switch. They got General Great-Greatma instead.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As a one-off, the movie might seem like a little miracle - a fresh take on nostalgia not too different in tone from last year's delightful Turbo Kid. But stretched out... a hard crust of cynicism is apparent just beneath the sugar-dusted surface.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: as long as the viewer does not need to contend with Jar-Jar Binks or a pod race, any Star Wars film delivers more than a ticket's worth of entertainment.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It is easy to assume that Lucas sold the franchise to the Xerox Corporation - because the new film is nothing more than a weak photocopy of the 1977 classic and its 1980 follow-up.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A canny crowd-pleaser of reversals, replays and reveals.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Despite the copious servings of tragic threats and good feelings, the production sinks under the weight of its emotional calculation.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Yes, the Force really awakens

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The creative team is to be commended for a franchise resurrection that catches the spirit of what knocked the socks off a prior generation of galactic film fans. Epic entertainment. Epic movie event.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It all comes together nicely as the actors breathe vulnerability, fallibility and personality into their roles, with Daisy Ridley being quite the commanding presence. My favourite, hands down, is the cute and rotund droid BB-8.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's precisely what you expect. Nothing more. Nothing less. And there isn't anything wrong with that.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is an exciting, nostalgic, powerful and moving film, that is capable of generating accelerated heartbeats and knots in the throat.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars returns to be fun again on the big screen.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: While Star Wars: The Force Awakens gets temporarily bogged down taking us back to the world that we left in 1983, it introduces us to the new and exciting torch-bearers of the franchise.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: At the end The Force Awakens looks more like a nostalgic film that will work as a transition to the new Star Wars' age.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This film is a well-planned product that balances nostalgia with the capacity to attract new generations into the Star Wars universe.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The ingenous script makes the audience get hooked trying to guess the film's next move, only to be surprised when the unexpected occurs.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is as good as it is bad; fluent as it lacks in emotion; affecting like the original trilogy as much as it is disrespectful with those who seek something new.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's enjoyable in the moment but leaves us little to chew on, to dream on.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A thrilling outer space epic breathing new life into a once flagging franchise!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This was not a movie made under the weight of calculated strategy; it was given life by those who took immense pride in their association, and sought to enhance an established legacy with grand enthusiasm.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's like [Abrams] put Episodes IV, V, and VI in a blender. It's an act of love, no doubt about it. ... [But it] lacks any image of its own that is truly iconic.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There's no end in sight. The force has awakened.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams and his crew have restored the shine to our beloved story.The Force is awakened, indeed.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: ...the tendency for the narrative to repeat the beats of A New Hope, though perfectly logical in a saga founded upon the constancy of the hero's journey, comes off as pandering fan-fiction.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This is very similar to the first Star Wars film, but it isn't as family friendly. Hope and optimism are lacking in this reboot. What it lacks in optimism, it makes up for with hype, having been promoted along with every product known to man.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: ...secret threads on social media are already picking their nits and debating theories; it's going to be a tough wait to see what happens next.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Springs to life around a terrific new star.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: What Abrams delivers here is still a pretty good start to this new trilogy, but you can't help but think how great it might have been if they had done their own thing and given us something new.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams plays it safe, but it's a good kind of safe, because, for the first time in ages, the Star Wars saga has personable leads.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It does exactly what it needs to be a crowd-pleaser in that regard. But whether it breaks any new ground ... not so much.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I didn't mind the many nods to the original two movies -- at least they nick story points from the right ones.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Another Death Star-like super weapon?! When will the Empire learn to quit designing them with weak spots where a few well aimed strikes can destroy the entire thing!

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens begins another epic chapter in the Star Wars saga in the best possible way.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The new movie, as an act of pure storytelling, streams by with fluency and zip.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams keeps the plot moving at a brisk pace that keeps the viewer from overthinking it until after the credits roll, but not so brisk that we can't relax and enjoy the ride. And what a ride it is.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a well-acted, fun, and zippy time at the movies.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's beautiful to look at, brilliantly acted, breathlessly exciting, frequently amusing, yet capable of delivering some emotional gut-punches that take it into the dark territory inhabited by The Empire Strikes Back.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force is still here.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's not just a great piece of science fiction, or a great piece of cinema: it's a new hope.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This film is a particularly chilling portrait of the relationship between father and son.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I'd be inclined to give it a honorable third spot, way, ways behind episodes IV and V, and just about the same place as Return of the Jedi.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The film is basically a "greatest hits" compilation of episodes IV and V, and little else.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The light saber is drawn, the battle stance is set, and the Force is most definitely strong with this one.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A sweeping return to form for the film series, one that is absolutely excellent and will hopefully open the door for more exciting conflicts.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: ... a complete fan-service that combines the exciting storytelling and use of practical effects from the original trilogy with the crisp, vibrant color palette and clean computer graphics of the prequels.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Appealing both to a new generation of viewers and fans of the series since the beginning, this 30-years-later sequel to 1983's Return of the Jedi is a thrilling adventure.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The force is strong in this spirited sequel. This is the movie that "Star Wars" fans have been waiting decades for.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: That's what's so impressive about the tricky balancing act Abrams has pulled off with The Force Awakens: He's made a movie that's simultaneously gripping and a huge release. We are in good hands, at last.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force is with filmmaker J.J. Abrams, who makes sure this Star Wars adventure contains thrilling action scenes, exciting special effects, and colorful characters.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A money grab in which wunderkind J.J. Abrams choses to go where George Lucas has gone before by basically repeating plot points, even lines, from the original trilogy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I found myself listening to a chorus of spontaneous gasps, cheers, laughs, whoops and even occasional cries of anguish. What's really surprising is that many of them were coming from me.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: And just like that, the scars of 16 years and lesser trilogies were magically washed away. We've seen much of what's onscreen before, but Abrams brings a fresh energy to pacing and performances that reminds us of the joy of watching Star Wars films

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: dishes out familiarity without apology and arranges it in such a way that, even as we recognize the patterns and beats, it feels fresh and invigorating and, lest we forget what's really at stake here, fun

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams has, for the most part, taken the safe road, not re-inventing the wheel, but building a solid, respectful and, at times, darn entertaining reboot.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: With The Force Awakens, Abrams has begun one of the most important reclamation projects of our time: the complete erasure from cultural memory of The Phantom Menace and its sequels.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's enough to make a grown fan cry.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Brandishing both a wand and a wink at audiences, and split somewhere between colossal and cartoonish. And no, I am not now nor have I ever been a Star Wars junkie. Akin to an atheist at the church podium. And likely my fate: Let the haters be with you.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: An exciting winner for fans and box office

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams' thrilling sci-fi adventure marks a rebirth in exciting galactic entertainment.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's loaded with nostalgia

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The film knows it's dealing with iconic elements of pop culture, recognizes them as such and shows enormous joy while using them.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Does not disappoint.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As far as I'm concerned, "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" is the best film of the year.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Complete with the great John Williams score, dazzling special effects, lots of good humor -- and of course, the creatures, it's a real crowd pleaser.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I'll cut to the chase: yes, it lives up to the hype. J.J. Abrams has created a film that stays true to the original series while updating it for a new generation.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Three or four moments of astonishing beauty and three or four more that will make you want to cheer.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I don't think I've ever been so completely satisfied with a film. Considering the insane amount of build up and the wild expectations I had, it's almost miraculous that a film could live up.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The movie delivers in every conceivable way, on every imaginable level. Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a PhD. level course in Getting It Exactly Right.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As a stand-alone movie, it's enjoyable but not extraordinary. As a continuation of a franchise, it needs a "Warning: Under Construction" sign.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The rule here is being pleasant, not bold. That is, pleasant to the owners, the empire, the one that paid a ton of money for this cow and it's willing to milk it until there's nothing but dry bones.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Obviously, it helps to know the old characters, but Han, Luke and the rest are cultural legends that even the young new fans will know about them.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Maybe the new sequels and spin-offs can be more adventurous, but The Force Awakens had me smiling, reminiscing, and critiquing all at the same time: It hits all the marks, without any real surprises.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: 'The Force Awakens,' written by Abrams, Lawrence Kasdan and Michael Arndt, offers enough salutes and nods to the original trilogy to please those fans, while introducing interesting and likable characters that will entice new followers to the series.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars: The Force Awakens is just what the fans have been hoping and dreaming about for a long, long time.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Epic Star Wars sequel delivers great performances, action.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This is why I love Star Wars. This is why I love movies.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: After George Lucas put is to sleep with episodes I, II and III, the Force is definitely awake. The most fun I've had in a theater this year.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: So go out, get your ticket and join in all the hullabaloo; confident this time you won't get Jar-Jar-ed.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The familiarity feels good, feels comfortable - "Chewie, we're home," as Han Solo says. But it also hems in the new film's ability to really be its own thing

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams nails the feeling of (re)visiting a rusted-out, slightly sarcastic fairy tale. Still, a few hours after the credits it's all evaporating and I'm struggling to recall a remotely original or inventive moment in the entire damn thing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Ultimately, Star Wars: The Force Awakens wins us over because it is about hope.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Daisy Ridley, who crosses effortlessly into stardom here, has a face of the sort that cinematographers so often seek in vain.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Chewy, I'm home.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There are no midichlorians. There are no fart jokes. No sequences that blatantly scream "I AM A VIDEO GAME CONCEPT!" No Gunguns. And it's all wonderful.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There are echoes of the past in each of these characters, but they resonate in new ways.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a huge amount of fun, although whether the self-referential nature and the did-we-surprise-you-there style of plot reveals stand the test of time remains to be seen.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: [The Force Awakens] rarely stops moving, yet its action never seems excessive. That's because combatants and targets always remain clear instead of fuzzed up by the hyper-speed visuals hack action directors use.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This movie stands proudly as an example of the magic that once was routine in movie theaters. It makes kids of us again and allows us to discover that going to the movies can indeed still be a special event.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A film that fans of the old movies will relish but one that looks bound to capture the imagination of a new audience, too.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There are no glaring missteps in The Force Awakens, and on such a stage this kind of performance might even pass for greatness -- for a little while.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: All points converge for a dramatic, emotionally charged finale, and a lightsaber duel up there with the best of the first trilogy. These fights work best as an extension of the story, not over-choreographed showcases for stunt workers.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' easily lives up to its mammoth hype, but it's not flawless, nor a better film than the original trilogy. It is a non-stop action film with a shotgun pace, like plugging the cotton candy machine directly into your face.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I bet you'll have fun - I did, mostly. But it's the fun of seeing something fairly successfully redone, with the promise of more of the same to come.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's everything the kid in us goes to the movies for -- marvelous adventure that leaves us surprised, scared and euphoric.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams has taken the staff (or lightsaber if you will) and has reshaped the destiny of this saga in the right direction.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This episode brings warmth back to a franchise more frozen than a dead Tauntaun. Let's hope the second and third movies continue the thaw.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: From old joys to fresh twists, this is a unique blockbuster experience that celebrates the franchise whilst also expanding it.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The action scenes are excellent, the special effects are superb and there's good doses of humor, suspense and drama all along the way.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: [W]e can sense the film establishing itself as the backbone for a new narrative cycle. It's a promising start.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams and his fellow writers have gone deep to get back to what Star Wars was and promised to be. Force seeds it well with nostalgia, blood ties and galactic prospects for the next chapters.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: AS a critic, this is a good movie. As a fan, I'm devastated.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams and company know exactly where your emotional hanging curve balls are, and they hit every one of them out of the park.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams delivers a love letter to the Star Wars universe, one made not only as a hardcore fan, but as a filmmaker who studied the source material thoroughly.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The saga returns with more energy than before, with known and new characters that revitalize this cinematic universe.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Makes you remember the brilliance of 'A New Hope' and 'The Empire Strikes Back', but also makes you curious for what may come with Episodes VIII and IX.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: JJ Abrams bring the franchise back to life with a perfect mix of nostalgia and innovation.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A thrilling ride from start to finish.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Relative unknowns Daisy Ridley, a legitimate star in the making, and John Boyega sort of pick up where the likes of Leia and Han left off.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's amalgam of old and new, a thrill ride that satisfies in its own right as well as in assuaging the fears of fans.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: "Force" brings fun back to "Star Wars."

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The dialogue is punchy. The actors are engaged and human. The action sequences and special effects complement the plot rather than make up for it. The story rockets along.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A worthy successor.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: [J.J. Abrams'] ability to absorb other creators' styles makes him perfect for carrying on a series like this.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: But the movie can't sustain its playfulness-or its tension, either. Abrams is too busy trying to roll the original Star Wars and The Empire Strikes Back into one two-hour-and-15-minute movie.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Some with no memory of being swept away almost forty years ago will follow strong new heroes and villains. For those old enough now and young enough then to have childhoods consumed by this stuff, it's a satisfying new turn in a near life-long tale.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The fun of The Force Awakens comes from visiting an old friend and finding that little has changed; the excitement is that great performances from all four new leads means it's a strong foundation for whatever comes next.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's nostalgia-baiting as heck, but also quite forward-looking. While it's an exciting first chapter, perhaps the most thrilling thing about The Force Awakens is what will follow.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It is a rip-roaring, swashbuckling jaunt through galactic space which will leave you reeling.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There is, of course, CGI in The Force Awakens, but it's comparatively minimal. The film looks handmade, and this allows for a greater range of human emotion, too. When tragedy strikes, you feel it.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Finally, I'm able to watch a new chapter of the Star Wars saga and actually look forward to the next film. And man, that's nice.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The story is compelling. The acting is great. The technical aspects are solid. But it's hard to escape the idea that the film is a remix of something else, an attempt to rework story elements that felt more original elsewhere.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As with other installments, this is less a movie than an exercise in massaging a juvenile-minded audience that wants the experience to be new and familiar at the same time.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: As a nostalgia trip that knows exactly what die-hard Star Wars fans want and then layers in some memorable new characters, The Force Awakens is exactly what it needs to be: an old-school Saturday afternoon sci-fi matinee writ big.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams and company have brought Star Wars home again by reigniting the soul, spirit and sense of wonder of the three original films.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Like their Star Wars forebears, Boyega's Finn and Ridley's Rey are brave, funny, and admirable but also imperfect, uncertain, and sometimes afraid. That is to say, they're genuine, multisided characters with believable motivations.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Of the canonical films, it's the first in which the humans actually behave and talk like recognizable people.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The most wildly anticipated and furiously hyped movie of the millennium is finally here and the collective exhalation of relief can be heard around the globe if not the galaxy. Fans can rest easy. JJ Abrams' Star Wars reboot is a triumph.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Charts a path to a future that refuses to get mired in nostalgia. Yet all the Star Wars notes are here, remixed into a glorious new arrangement.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Episode 7 of "Stars Wars" is an enjoyable retread, full of great new young actors and returning favorites.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens reboots the franchise right ... so why does it feel like a 'Star Wars' remake more than a sequel?

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The best disappointing movie ever.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: If we can't have an original story, in the purest sense, or even original characters, we're asked to be content with a Star Wars film that's aesthetically rich, lovingly made and true to the meat and potatoes storytelling fundamentals of old.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A rollicking adventure that brings back pure escapism, epic visuals, and boldly designed heroes and villains, making the return to a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away all the more satisfying.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A near perfect Star Wars film that regular fans and fanatics alike have been waiting for, but it suffers by slavishly sticking to the tropes from the original and doesn't strive to go off script.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It may be the youngest, but it acts like a middle child-it's the Jan Brady of Star Wars. It's at odds with franchise siblings for attention but there is a deep love for the material; there's charm to the mimicry.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Even before Han and Chewie appear - and what a wonderful reveal it is - The Force Awakens is undeniably a Star Wars movie.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Content merely to continue the story...It answers the question "Where are they now?" but has no new thoughts or insights regarding the stories we know.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is thrilling and fun, but fans of A New Hope might have more than a hint of déjà vu.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: John Boyega's Finn - the reformed Stormtrooper with a heart of gold - whoops in delight throughout J.J. Abrams' Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Who could blame him?

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Well, was it worth the wait and the anticipation? In my book, yes

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The old and the new are seamlessly interwoven in this swashbuckling intergalactic adventure that satisfies on every level with its superb storytelling, endearing characters, splashy visual effects and a masterful score

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A swift, entertaining, and comfortable "Star Wars" movie, one that will feel familiar to fans of the original trilogy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: an action-adventure film for the ages. And, bonus, not an annoying Ewok in sight.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Dramatically, the film does pull some great aces from up its sleeve...The film also proves what a lot of Star Wars fans have long suspected - that the best thing that could happen to Star Wars would be to take George Lucas out of it.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: New planets and old faces, original characters and veterans to guide them - this is a franchise reborn, not reinvented.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: incredibly fresh and a whole lot of fun

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The prequels don't stand a chance - this is as good as fans could have hoped for and better than we deserve.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams' homage to the first Star Wars film - the one that took our collective breath away, the one that defined our childhoods - takes "fan service" to new heights, which is not necessarily a bad thing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: 'Star Wars' comes full circle... the cherished familiar interlaced with hints of more to come...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Just as he did so successfully with the Mission Impossible and Star Trek brands, Abram's has breathed new life into Star Wars; why it should then feel lacking in a strong pulse at times is worth pondering.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: All you really want to know is whether it's good, right? Well, in fact, it is better than it had to be.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The best, most thrilling Star Wars movie to date...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: With its breakneck pacing; intelligent and measured reverence for the original films; punchy action sequences; and ambitious plotting, Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a near perfect continuation of the most beloved movie franchise of all time.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The long wait is over, and the news is good: The Force Awakens heralds the new dawn you hoped for.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A good piece of adventure cinema that never feels like it had a chance of being a great piece of adventure cinema.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's not just a comment on Disney's inescapable marketing barrage, but a sincerely intended complement that the fresh-faced heroes and antiheroes The Force Awakens introduces feels like future friends you've heard a lot about but are only just meeting.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars 7: The Force Awakens is a welcome comeback for the franchise, and fan love will be enough to propel most viewers past its flaws.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Unquestionably the best Star Wars movie we've seen in 30 years, and an undeniably entertaining ride - but one certainly not without a collection of narrative flaws.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Story and spectacle are what count, and Abrams delivers the latter with deftly realised reprises of favorite scenes and thrilling set piece.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: I don't want you skimming paragraphs trying to find the sentence where I say it's good, so here it is. Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a spectacularly good movie.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A fast-paced, good-spirited, thoroughly approachable action movie that grabs and keeps your attention from first frame to last

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Though the plot is overly familiar, Abrams hits all the right beats and leaves us hungry for the next chapter.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The first thing I thought as the credits rolled was that I can't wait to see it again.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Out of this world.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It exists less as a meaningful extension of its world than as a fan-service deployment device.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: When The Force Awakens gets going, you couldn't ask for a more propulsive, joyous or witty Star Wars film

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Kids and adults alike are going to eat this thing up and come back for seconds and thirds, probably in the same weekend, if they can score tickets.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a relief to see a big, splashy movie that actually maintains a sense of childlike play.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Make no mistake: the new film delivers. It is in no way disappointing, except in its conformity.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams is a hyper-competent entertainer, and a fan, with an astute understanding of what made the original trilogy appealing.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Even if this adventure spans the galaxy, Ford's presence tends to bring things down to earth.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Abrams is also too susceptible to the solemn self-mythologising that always threatened to spoil the fun of any Star Wars film. He hasn't made a terrible picture -- just a safe one, where the farthest reaches of fantasy feel merely routine.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: What [Abrams has] done is to remake Star Wars: A New Hope; tweaking it for the passage of time; improving on the acting, the effects, and the dialogue; and tossing in some bits from its sequels.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: We get to spend a lot of fun and/or dramatic time with Ford's Solo, while Ridley's Rey and Boyega's Finn give us a pair of dynamic new heroes to follow in future Star Wars Episodes.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Anyone who enjoys the other movies, particularly Episodes 4 through 6, should be perfectly satisfied with the direction of the franchise.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: An incredible science-fiction and adventure film.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: You feel the tragedy, your jaw will hurt from the excitement, you will be on the edge of your seat trying to guess what happens next.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Somewhere along the way, Abrams begins delivering everything we expect, as opposed to those nebulous wonders we didn't know we wanted.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This mediatic circus has entertained me moderately, wishing the film would be a little shorter. What can I say? Not really my cup of tea.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is a glorious reminder of why this is one of the most beloved sagas of all time.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Strives to unite old and new generations of Star Wars fans and mostly succeeds.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" is simple and highly entertaining, a rollicking adventure that avoids anything about trade federations or blockades.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens is half reboot, half remake, and all fun.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams and team brilliantly merge the old and the new into a Star Wars that soars on every level. Han Solo is back but it is Daisy Ridley's Rey that is the heart of The Force Awakens. She's a keeper.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: From the opening crawl to the ending credits, it's the Star Wars movie we waited decades for, and it sets the stage for even bigger, better and bolder adventures to come.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens works quite well considering it is lumbered with an unshakable neurosis throughout.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams's sleek, feverishly hyped Episode Seven injects the moribund series with humor and humanity, but relies too much on remixed bits from the original trilogy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Thrilling and knowing in all the right places, it's sure to satisfy fans that have breathlessly awaited its arrival for years. Unfamiliar with Jedi lore? You too will give in to the force of cinematic greatness.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The Force Awakens leans heavily on the original Star Wars, and that's comforting for fans, though one hopes [Episode VIII] will take more risks.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a brilliant next step in the saga, and it leaves you wanting more... which is exactly what it needed to do.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The nostalgic callbacks are so insistent that they can stop the narrative dead, like when some real drama is about to go down but everything pauses so we can have a meet-cute with C-3PO. Even the main villain comes off as some emo Darth Vader fanboy.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It's a solid space opera spectacle with enough nostalgia to overpower even the most hard-hearted child of the '70s and '80s but it relies a little too much on recycling old plot elements.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: There's plenty to enjoy here, whether you're a casual fan or someone who was blown away a long time ago, in a theater far, far away.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Personally enjoyed the hell out of it; critically, I felt, OK, this is a really good start and a step in the right direction with room for improvement.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: For the first hour or so of The Force Awakens, director J. J. Abrams gives you everything you hoped for, and even exceeds your expectations.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: To millions of moviegoers, the force is with us once again, and that is good.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: With the care of a true fan, Abrams melds the old with the new, bringing in fresh elements while reintroducing the characters and themes fans have loved for nearly four decades.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Exhilarating, if highly derivative...an enjoyable throwback that is largely content to replicate its models rather than taking the narrative in any significantly new direction.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Director J.J. Abrams is like a kid trying to cram in as much playtime as possible before bed. His enthusiasm is infectious, almost overwhelming.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Star Wars has returned to us again, and it brings us a wonderful gift: a brand new chapter, mixing old and new elements, original and new cast, in [an] amazing picture.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: It is not a little disheartening to see this new 'Star Wars' installment not blazing its own path but rather chasing its tail and rehashing its former glories for our approval.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: J.J. Abrams rescusitates the series far more in keeping with the original trilogy than their creator George Lucas did with episodes I-III. The Saturday morning serial feel is back...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A fun if uneven return to a galaxy far, far away.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Its script is ludicrous, riddled with coincidences and a fealty to existing text that a less forgiving person might call lazy. Yet I can't wait to see it again.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: The force is strong in this one.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: A return to the levity of the original trilogy. Ford is as good with zingers as he is with blasters.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: ... "Star Wars" feel like "Star Wars" again ...

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" is the "Star Wars" sequel we have been looking for: a classic adventure that harkens back to the glory days of 1977's "Star Wars" and 1980's "The Empire Strikes Back."

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: This is a movie you don't want to end, despite a final shot that is one of the greatest in the franchise's storied history. Abrams has righted the ship. The "Star Wars" saga is back, and we are gleefully in it for the long haul.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
Critic Review: Delivers an effective mix of nostalgia and new storylines. Disney pulled off a modern-day Christmas miracle keeping the plot almost completely unknown to audiences. My advice is keep it that way.

Movie: STAR WARS: EPISODE VII - THE FORCE AWAKENS
